Weapon.Name: Whispering Blade
Weapon.Description: A slender sword that hums with a faint, eerie whisper when unsheathed, rumored to be crafted from a fallen star.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: As the blade cuts through the air, it silences the foe's cries.

Weapon.Name: Ember Staff
Weapon.Description: A staff that is warm to the touch, with a core that glows like coal. It is said to have been crafted by the legendary pyromancer, Eldran.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: The staff unleashes a torrent of flames, engulfing the enemy.

Weapon.Name: Shadow Daggers
Weapon.Description: A pair of daggers that seem to absorb the light around them. Said to be made from a darkness beyond this world.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: The daggers strike swiftly, leaving a trail of shadow in their wake.
